meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: SPECIAL INTRODUCTION – New Dallas Arboretum President
QUARTERLY SAFETY UPDATE
agenda_items.description: Update on Safety in the Park System
agenda_items.presenter: M. Renee Johnson, Chief Rick Watson, Chief David Pughes

agenda_items.title: Bachman Lake
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Capital Improvement Program Funding Agreement with Dallas County for a feasibility study to examine possible alignments for a proposed multi-use trail to connect Bachman Lake to the Campion Trail in the City of Irving

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the Department of the Interior’s (DOI) National Parks Service Save America’s Treasures grant program for the Tower Building Mural Restorations project

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of the Children’s Playground at the new 18-acre Community Park as the Rees-Jones Playground.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the National Endowment for the Humanities Sustaining Cultural Heritage Collections Grant Program for the preservation of select cultural documents, artifacts, and film at the Hall of State

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Construction Manager at Risk Agreement for pre-construction and construction services for the Cotton Bowl Renovation, Rehabilitation and Addition Project

agenda_items.title: State Fair of Texas Wrap Up
2024 Bond Program: Update on Priority Project Lists
